properties.address: Parkstone United Reformed Church building, Dorset BH14 0JW
properties.description: Living Room is open to public from 10.30am to 2pm on Monday, Wednesday and Friday. We offer hot drinks, cakes, and toast plus people can play top games, read a book or talk to others or just be in a warm place around kind and welcoming people. We offer exchange or swap by donation outdoor clothing, books and cd's. People have chance to attend other numerous and exciting activities offered on site.
properties.title: Community Living Room

properties.description: We welcome everyone from our local community. Free lunch of homemade soup, sandwiches and cake plus a variety of activities including crafts, table tennis etc

properties.address: Commercial Rd, Poole, Parkstone, Dorset BH14 0JW
properties.description: The Living Room is a space open to public on Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 10.30am till 2pm. We offer hot drinks, cakes and toast plus visitors can enjoy table top games, free Wi-Fi, a wide range of books or just talk to each other. Outdoor clothing, CD's and books for exchange/ swap or by donation.
properties.title: Community Living Room

properties.description: This is available to older people, who need some company and a warm space to meet others and have a hot meal. It runs from 10.30-2pm. This is run in partnership with PramaCare. Places need to be booked in advance - please contact boscombe@salvationarmy.org.uk
properties.title: Fellowship morning & Lunch Club

properties.address: Gateway Church, 502 Ashley Road, Poole, Dorset BH14 0AD
properties.description: Gatehouse is a community hub offering a warm welcome to all, providing free refreshments and WiFi. There are volunteers available to chat, who can also signpost people to other agencies for help and support. We also run various activities and groups, including Golden Generations for retired folk, arts and crafts, board games, a toddler area, confidence sessions and a work space.
properties.title: Gatehouse @ 502
